0: Room was not ready at 4 pm so they offered drinks at the bar
The only error in service was room service breakfast one morning was nearly 12 hour late and served cold
Spend a few hours at the lobby bar between the events on Saturday and I met someone in the lobby bar that was in town for a separate wedding

Right after we checked in my husband had low blood sugar from not eating at the airport and on the plane thankfully the waitress took pity on him and brought us all kinds of snacks while waiting for our food to be prepared
We had actually considered it many times in the past and then decided not to usually in favor of a bed breakfast stay
At 5 they started serving hors doeuvres
We went to The Grill for dinner
The calamari said it came with an aioli but it just had a spicy red sauce which completely overwhelmed the dish
While I guess they always billed this as the more casual of the 2 restaurants years ago it was far from casual
Wanted to order room service but no menu in the room
1: However the neighborhood it is located in is very safe and has shops and restaurants of equal quality nearby
Had drinks with colleagues in the lobby bar and found the server and the drinks to be excellent
The restaurant staff was extremely warm and friendly like they really cared
The lobby is gorgeous and almost every night they have a wonderful sushi bar
on to the breakfast buffet before I close my review let us just say scrumptious
The grill and restaurant are also outstanding
Always has food drinks and lots of candy available complimentary as soon as the elevators open
With easy access and distance to some of Saint Louis attractions including some of the best restaurants in the city is the ideal place for us to stay while in town
Restaurant and bar staff top notch very friendly but professional
The lunches and dinners were very good as well
